channel.title: How do i make the ancients spells glowing whe nu have runes ?!
channel.description: hello again ^^ i would like to know if is there anyways to make them glow .. cause now they stay black and i dont like that . i used gangscape source and they was all glowing its fucking cool :P and i would like to make them like that in hellzend ! so please gimme some help :P

item.title: How do i make the ancients spells glowing whe nu have runes ?!
item.dc:creator: @jujitsubb777 jujitsubb777
item.description:
@jujitsubb777 wrote:

In most clients, theirs like a “stackable.txt” file. go in their, find out the item code, and slap the code in the stackable section with its proper group! *also note, Stackable.txt may vary depending on your source! But i suggest you look for something like maybe “Stack.txt” or “itempile.txt”.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make the ancients spells glowing whe nu have runes ?!
